hasFinishLineBeenCrossed(int) - Static method in class Monitors.RaceTrack
Determines if the finish line has been crossed by the calling Thread.

Spectator checks if he won his bet.
honorBets() - Static method in class Monitors.BettingCentre
Broker honors a Bet, wakes next Spectator in line and waits for the next Spectator claiming a reward until all rewards are given.
Horse - Class in Threads
The Horse class is a thread that contains the lifecycle of the Horse during the day.
